Ryan Kavuma-McQueen (born 1 January 2009) is an English professional footballer who plays as a winger for Chelsea.
Early life
Kavuma-McQueen was born on 1 January 2009. Born in England, he is of Ugandan descent through his parents.
Club career
As a youth player, Kavuma-McQueen joined the youth academy of Premier League side Chelsea at the age of seven.
International career
Kavuma-McQueen is an England youth international. During October 2025, he played for the England national under-17 football team for 2026 UEFA European Under-17 Championship qualification.
